inertia.translation[0].definitions[0].de: when no one wants to do anything to change a situation
inertia.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the force that keeps an object in the same position or keeps it moving until it is moved or stopped by another force
inertia.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a lack of energy and a feeling that you do not want to do anything
inertia.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a tendency for a situation to stay the same for a long time
inertia.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: He believes that suppressed demand after years of inertia will lead to a housing recovery this year.
